(a b c : ℝ) : a⁻¹ + b⁻¹ + c⁻¹ = bc + ac + ab → bc + ac + ab ≤ (1 / 3) * (a + b + c) ^ 2 := by
(x y z : ℝ) (hx: x ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1 ∧ y ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1 ∧ z ∈ Set.Ioo 0 1)(habc : x*y*z = (1-x)*(1-y)*(1-z)) : x+y+z >= 1 := by
new: {k : ℕ} {a b c : ℕ} (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c) (h₁ : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 + c ^ 2 = k) (h₂ : a * b * c ≤ k) : a + b + c ≥ 1 ∧ a * b + b * c + c * a ≥ 1:= by
{f : ℝ → ℝ} (h₀ : ∀ x y, f (x ^ 2) + f (2 * y ^ 2) = (f (x + y) + f y) * (f (x - y) + f y)) (h₁ : ∃ k:ℝ, ∀ x:ℝ, f x = k * x) : ∃ k:ℝ, ∀ x:ℝ, f x = k * x := by

old: (x y z : ℝ) (h : x + y + z = 0) : (Real.sqrt (9 + 16 * Real.exp (2 * x)) - 4 * Real.exp x) + (Real.sqrt (9 + 16 * Real.exp (2 * y)) - 4 * Real.exp y) + (Real.sqrt (9 + 16 * Real.exp (2 * z)) - 4 * Real.exp z) ≥ 3 := by
new: (a b c d : ℝ) (ha : 0 ≤ a) (hb : 0 ≤ b) (hc : 0 ≤ c) (hd : 0 ≤ d) : Real.sqrt (a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 + c ^ 2 + d ^ 2) ≥ (a + b + c + d) / 4:= by

old: (a b : ℝ) : Real.sqrt (a * b) * (Real.sqrt a + Real.sqrt b)^2 ≤ (a + b)^2 := by

new: (a b : ℝ) (m : ℕ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hab : a ≤ b) : a ^ m ≤ b ^ m := by

old: {p q r a b c : ℝ} (hp : p = a + b + c) (hq : q = a * b + b * c + c * a) (hr : r = a * b * c) : 27 * q ^ 2 - 54 * r + 12 * q ≤ 5 := by
new: (a b c : ℝ) (hp : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c) (hab : a + b + c = 1) : Real.sqrt (a + b + c) ≥ 2 / 3 ∧ Real.sqrt (a + b + c) ≥ 2 * (a * b + b * c + c * a) - 1 / 9 := by

old: (x : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x ∧ x < Real.pi / 4) : (sin x)^(cos x) < (cos x)^(sin x) := by
new: : (∀ x : ℝ, 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 1 → Real.sqrt (x^2 + 1 ) ≥ cos x) ∨ (∀ x : ℝ, 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 1 → Real.sqrt (x^2 + 1 ) < cos x) ∨ (∀ x : ℝ, 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 1 → Real.sqrt (x^2 + 1 ) ≥ cos x ∧ Real.sqrt (x^2 + 1 ) < cos x) ∨ (∀ x : ℝ, 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 1 → Real.sqrt (x^2 + 1 ) < cos x ∧ Real.sqrt (x^2 + 1 ) ≥ cos x):= by

old: (p x : ℕ) (hp : p.Prime) : totient (p^x) = p^x - p^(x-1) := by
new: (a b : ℕ) : φ (a.gcd b) * φ a * φ b = φ a * φ b * φ (a.gcd b) := by

old: (f : ℝ → ℝ): (∀ x y, f (f (x + y)) = f (x + y) + f x * f y - x * y) ↔ ∀ x, f x = x := by
(a b c : ℝ) (hab : a > 0 ∧ b > 0 ∧ c > 0) (habc : a + b + c = a * b + b * c + c * a) : a + b + c + 1 ≥ 4 * a * b * c := by

new: (n : ℕ) (h₁ : 1 < n) : ∀ i ∈ (Finset.range n), ∀ j ∈ (Finset.range n), i < j → i ≥ 0 ∧ j ≥ 0 ∧ i + j < 2 * n ∧ i + j ≥ 2 * i := by

old: (a b c x y z : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y ∧ 0 < z)(hab : a + b > c) (hbc : b + c > a) (hca : a + c > b) : a/x+b/y+c/z > a/(y+z)+b/(x+z)+c/(x+y) := by
new: (a b c : ℝ) : a * (b * c) = b * (c * a) := by
(x : ℝ) : (sin x ^ 2 + cos x ^ 2) * sin x * cos x = sin x * cos x * (sin x ^ 2 + cos x ^ 2):= by

old: (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a + b + c = 1) : a / Real.sqrt (1 - c) + b / Real.sqrt (1 - a) + c / Real.sqrt (1 - b) ≤ 5 / 4 := by
new: (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a + b + c = 1) : Real.sqrt (1 - b) ≥ Real.sqrt (a + b) - 1:= by
(x y z u v w : ℝ) (h₀ : x + y + z = u + v + w) (h₁ : x^2 + y^2 + z^2 = u^2 + v^2 + w^2) : x * y + x * z + y * z = u * v + u * w + v * w:= by

old: (a b c d : ℝ) : a^2 + b^2 + c^2 + d^2 + a * b * c * d + 1 ≥ a * b + a * c + a * d + b * c + b * d + c * d := by

new: (t : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < t) (h₁ : t < 1) (x : ℝ) (h₂ : x ≥ 0 ∧ x ≤ 1) : Real.sqrt (1+t) + Real.sqrt (1 - t) ≥ Real.sqrt ((1 + t) * (1 - t)):= by

old: (n : ℕ) (a : ℕ → ℝ) (h : ∀ i, 0 ≤ a i ∧ a i < 1) : (1 / (2 ^ n)) * (∏ i in Finset.range n, (2 - a i)) / (∏ i in Finset.range n, (1 - a i)) ≥ (4 + ∑ i in Finset.range n, a i) / (4 - ∑ i in Finset.range n, a i) := by
new: (f : ℕ → ℝ) (n : ℕ) (hf: ∀ k: ℕ, k < n → 0 < f k) (h2f: ∀ k: ℕ, k < n → f k ≤ 1) : ∏ k in Finset.range n, f k ≥ 0:= by

old: (a b c d x y z : ℝ) : a + b + c + d + |a - b + c - d| ≥ x + y + z + |x - y + z| := by
new: (y : ℝ) : (∀ x < y, ∃ z, x + z ≥ y) ↔ ∀ x ≤ y, ∃ z, x + z = y:= by
(z w : ℂ) : (Complex.abs (z * w + z + w) + 1) * ((Complex.abs (z * w + z + w + 3) + 1)) ≥ (Complex.abs ((z * w + z + w + 3))) := by

old: (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) : (a^a * b^b * c^c)^2 ≥ a^(b + c) * b^(c + a) * c^(a + b) := by

new: (x : ℝ) (hx : 0 ≤ x) : Real.sqrt (1 + x ^ 2) ≥ 1 + x - 1:= by
